message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this product. I'm counteroffering at $825000. It's a compromise, but I think it's a good deal for both of us. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to go up to $800000, but I need to make sure I'm getting the best deal possible. Can you consider my new offer?
